languages.text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

traits.locale_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has Imperialis — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
The wearer also gains +10 Lore (Imperium).

The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

languages.text:
装备者获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}。
如果装备者拥有信念{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——拥护者或更高级信念，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}的检定结果将取决于社交，而非{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}。此外，装备者获得+10知识（帝国）。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}。
如果装备者拥有信念{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——拥护者或更高级信念，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}的检定结果将取决于社交，而非{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}。此外，装备者获得+10知识（帝国）。

languages.text:
Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерции{/g}.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} (сторонник или выше), то значение его навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g} зависит от Общительности, а не от {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, а персонаж получает +10 к Знаниям: Империум.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

traits.locale_text:
Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерции{/g}.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением Империум (сторонник или выше), то значение его навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g} зависит от Общительности, а не от {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}.
Персонаж также получает +10 к Знаниям: Империум.

Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерции{/g}.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением Империум (сторонник или выше), то значение его навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g} зависит от Общительности, а не от {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}.
Персонаж также получает +10 к Знаниям: Империум.

languages.text:
使用者は+5の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と+10の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}を得る。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 門下生かそれ以上を持っている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}ではなく連帯によって決まり、さらに+10の伝承（帝国）を得る。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}+5、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}+10
自身が帝国 ― 門下生かそれ以上を持っていれば、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}ではなく連帯によって決定される。
さらに、自身の伝承（帝国）+10

languages.text:
El portador gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} y +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}.
Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Partidario o superior, su {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g} depende de la Empatía en lugar de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y gana +10 de Conocimiento (Imperium).
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

traits.locale_text:
El portador gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} y +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}.
Si el portador tiene Imperialis: Partidario o superior, su {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g} depende de la Empatía en lugar de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
El portador también gana +10 de Conocimiento (Imperium).

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}.
Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} — Anhänger oder höher, hängt sein {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g} von Gefolgschaft anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} ab und er erhält +10 Wissen (Imperium).
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}.
Hat der Träger Imperialis – Anhänger oder höher, hängt sein {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g} von Gefolgschaft anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} ab.
Der Träger erhält außerdem +10 Wissen (Imperium).

languages.text:
L'utilisateur gagne 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur dispose de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Partisan (ou rang supérieur), sa {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g} dépend de la Sociabilité et non de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. L'utilisateur gagne également de 10 de Connaissance (Imperium).
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} et +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur dispose d'Imperialis — Partisan (ou rang supérieur), sa {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g} dépend de la Fraternité et non de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
L'utilisateur bénéficie également de +10 de Connaissance (Imperium).

languages.text:
Takan kişi, +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Tecim{/g} kazanır.
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Kültür (İmparatorluk){/g} yeteneği {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} yerine Sosyallik niteliğini baz alır ve kişi, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Kültür (İmparatorluk){/g} yeteneği kazanır.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).
